DOC.brief_summary: Some Akt inhibitor produce functional cardiovascular effect mark hypotension may limit clinical benefit . There current data whether autonomic failure present human clinically use dos . We test hypothesis Akt inhibition cause acute decrease sympathetic tone lower blood pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Autonomic Phenotype Before After Akt Inhibition
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed melanoma BRAF mutation relapse follow therapy BRAF inhibitor Enrolled clinical trial Vanderbilt Ingram Cancer Center ( VICC ) include arm oral Akt inhibitor Able willing provide inform consent Factors investigator 's opinion would prevent participant complete protocol , include poor compliance previous study unpredictable schedule Unable give inform consent
